results.name: Y.O.L.K - A Stealthy Egg Laying Game

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

results.name: La Leyenda de Las Tres Luces de Glaurung

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 HZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gigabyte PCI-ex GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2160 / AMD C-50 1ghz, 1 core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT 9600 / AMD RADEON 6250HD
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3GHZ, 4 Cores
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 650
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 510
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 95 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keep in mind that this game is not peformance heavy, so your system may work if you have slighty lower specs than this.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 610
  • DirectX: Version 12

results.name: Buccaneers! The New Age of Piracy

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2100 / AMD FX-4100 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for standard (non-VR) mode at lowest settings
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum requirements for VR mode OR standard mode at max settings

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Intel Core i5 equivalent and above)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6Ghz Single Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

  • Storage: 100 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM

requirements_en.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 18 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
